channel.title: Comments on: Another Smashing Success: SQL Saturday Madison 2013
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: Another success is right! These just keep getting better. So glad we have it in Madison - helps the budget and drive time out a lot :)<br /> For all that couldn't make it for logistical reasons, I have room to crash 15 minutes away, and friends with motels...
item.content:encoded:
Another success is right! These just keep getting better. So glad we have it in Madison – helps the budget and drive time out a lot ðŸ™‚
For all that couldn’t make it for logistical reasons, I have room to crash 15 minutes away, and friends with motels…
